titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Cyprus
Cyprus

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The State Archives Law of 1991 ensures that government documents including records from the Foreign Ministry are transferred to the State Archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Presidential Palace Avenue, 1447, Nicosia.
State Archives of Cyprus: Ministry of Justice and Public Order, CY-1461 Nicosia.
IBM Centrum Tower, 42-44 Grivas Digenis Avenue, Agioi Omologites

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write or visit the State Archives of Cyprus. Visitors must fill out an application to view documents.
